attributes.review: I got this app thinking I was going to like what was inside, but instead I hated the whole app. Everything stunk of racism and hate and bigotry. Such a shame. I had high hopes for it. 0 out of 10 would recommend.
attributes.title: So glitchy and super racist

attributes.review: First of all I opened it up to hear Cheeto man saying “grab them by the pus”. It takes forever to load and when it does you see his full white but on the screen. Would not recommend
attributes.title: Worst app

attributes.review: NO NO NO! I thought being called a Karen was worse but this app beats it! This App stole all my information and contacts and used my information for other things! It lags all the time and and barley even works! THIS IS A SCAM DO NOT DOWNLOAD IT😤
attributes.title: Worst app possible

attributes.review: I wanted to download the app to see what was going on in this world you know what I mean. First off I think someone was looking threw my camera on my iphone!!!! This app is so dangerous and the stench of the app disgusted me! I hope everyone else agrees.🤮🍃✨
attributes.title: Worst app period!!

attributes.review: terrible,terrible,terrible quality and everything about it couldn’t have been worse.
attributes.title: Would not recommend

attributes.review: When I open this I just see a crusty cheeto and I really don’t enjoy looking at that thing we call out president. Mr Cheeto has scared off my wife and kids. This app has made my experience in the U. S very no good and i dont recommend.
attributes.title: Horrible🤮

attributes.review: I was just trying to open the app and mind my day and then I clicked on it and saw a fried orange talking this is not what I downloaded I will not be going on this ever again because of this experience that was terrible
attributes.title: worst app ever

attributes.review: Don’t get this app, don’t support the racist man who uses his authority to take advantage of others. As soon as word started getting around about his actions he found the quickest way to silence the people.  If you stand with me rate, give this app THE WORST possible review.
attributes.title: DONT TAKE DOWN TIKTOK

attributes.review: this app is so horrible and don’t meet my expectations whatsoever💔 if i was a karen, i would demand to speak to the manager.🌈 however, i’m not that kind of person.💅🏼 nothing upsets me more than opening the app and seeing a big cheeto staring at me like this: 👁👅👁. it made me so uncomfortable and it’s upsetting me and my homegirl cause if we can’t go to this app, then where can we go😿 so this app is just terrible and all i have to say is 💖🧚 trump 2020✨💖 but on a gravestone🧚🙉🌈
attributes.title: i am ✨u n c o m f y✨

attributes.review: I just now came across this app while eating my DELIGHTFUL and DELICIOUS dinner when I decided to give it a download. It will always be my BIGGEST regret...I have a lot of regrets. To say the absolute LEAST, I lost my appetite, and that says a lot coming from someone like me.
attributes.title: Awful!
